item.title: What we know about Trump's 'framework of future deal' over Greenland
item.description: Denmark and Greenland have made it clear they will not relinquish sovereignty of the world's largest island.

item.title: Zelensky and Trump to meet as US envoy says ending war with Russia down to one issue
item.description: US envoy Steve Witkoff said he was optimistic about a deal ahead of talks with Russia's Vladimir Putin.

item.title: UK holds off joining Trump's Board of Peace over Putin concerns
item.description: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper says the Russian president has shown no commitment to peace in Ukraine.

item.title: Three dead in shooting in Australia's New South Wales
item.description: Residents have been told to stay indoors and avoid the area of the shooting.

item.title: Son-in-law of Venezuelan opposition candidate freed from jail, wife says
item.description: Rafael Tudares was arrested after his father-in-law, Edmundo González, ran against Nicolás Maduro in the election.
